forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
